title.narrative: Knowledge Partnership Programme (KPP) - Contract with IPE

description.narrative: This activity (Knowledge Partnership Programme (KPP) - Contract with IPE) is a component of Knowledge Partnership Programme (KPP) reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £5,894,938. This component benefits Developing countries, unspecified, and works in the following sector(s): Technological research and development, Research/scientific institutions. , with the following implementing partners: IPE Global Private Limited. The start date is 26-07-2011 and the end date is 30-06-2016.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

description.narrative: Industry - Economic Affairs - Industry - industrial research
